name: FaceFriendzy
description: Whack pictures of your friends in this fast paced tapping game of skill! Easily import pictures of your friends from Facebook, your photo library, or by using the camera and making them part of the game! FaceFriendzy is an easy game to play at first, but gets progressively more challenging as you move on to new levels. Addictive gameplay includes surprise characters that will appear along with your friends and keep you playing for hours. Includes Gamecenter so you can compare your scores with friends as well as try to earn achievements.
